Work Experience.title: Full Stack SWE Intern @ Productiv Inc.
Work Experience.shortDescription: Developed new features to improve the security and corruption detection of contract data uploading. Created new UI components, developed SCIM endpoints, and extended existing user permissions structures to allow for custom permissions management in product and with Okta SAML. Added logging and a user display for the customer's user settings.

Work Experience.title: Full Stack SWE @ Haven
Work Experience.shortDescription: Haven is a startup using AI to make home renovations easier for home-owners and contractors. Built out a MVP as a part of the founding team, winning the USC TroyLabs DEMO pitch competition. Attended USC MEPC startup incubator sessions and investor meetings.

Work Experience.title: Full Stack SWE Intern @ Productiv Inc.
Work Experience.shortDescription: Worked on the finance team to add application features on the front end and back end using Scrum. Built a new integration with Fyle to pull in and parse expenses using REST APIs and OAuth2. Standardized expense usage in the backend. Implemented new features into contract ingestion processes, including automatically detecting changes using hash values and validation pop-ups for the user.

Work Experience.title: International Baccaleaureate Tutor @ Valdo Academics
Work Experience.shortDescription: Tutor teaching IB level computer science, economics, and math, as well as the SAT.

Projects.title: MotionMuse
Projects.shortDescription: MotionMuse helps users learn how to dance along to their favorite dances, whether a Tik Tok dance or well-defined choreography. Built during the LAHacks 2023 hackathon at UCLA in a group of three.

Projects.title: Portal
Projects.shortDescription: A simplified adaptation of the game developed by Valve in 2007. This game was built using C++, with SDL powering the GUI. The game features five levels in which the player solves puzzles using the 'portal' gun.

Projects.title: Vue3 TypeWriter
Projects.shortDescription: A customizable Vue3 component that provides an inline typewriter effect, with functionality like allowing a list of strings, humanization, and more. An example of this can be seen on this website's landing page!

Projects.title: SoCalBeachForLife
Projects.shortDescription: An Android app developed in a group of three, displays a map of all beaches within a defined radius with routing to a parking lot if desired. Also displays surrounding restaurants to each beach, with a usage of the Yelp API to display the menus.

Activities.title: Social Chair @ USC Theta Tau
Activities.shortDescription: Theta Tau is the nationâ€™s oldest and largest professional engineering society, aimed at the development of its members through the pillars of service, professionalism, and brotherhood. Currently in my second tenure as a social chair.

Activities.title: Member @ USC Racing Electrical
Activities.shortDescription: Worked on developing and integrating new systems as a member of the electronics team, primarily using a raspberry PI as the base for an electronic dashboard. More specifically, used a CAN bus to display sensor information onto an LCD screen.
